        Construct a new AABB with the given values.
        Parameters:
        xmin - The minimum x value
        ymin - The minimum y value
        zmin - The minimum z value
        xmax - The maximum x value
        ymax - The maximum y value

        public AxisAlignedBoundingBox expand(double x,
                            double y,
                            double z)
        Expands the AABB by the given amount in both directions.
        Parameters:
        x - Distance to expand x by
        y - Distance to expand y by
        z - Distance to expand z by
        Returns:
        The same AABB

                              double y,

        Contracts the AABB by the given amount in both directions.

        y - Distance to contract y by
        z - Distance to contract z by

      • intersectsWith

        public boolean intersectsWith(AxisAlignedBoundingBox other)
        Returns true if the two AABB's intersect, false otherwise. They may share edges.
        Parameters:
        other - The other AABB to test collision with
        Returns:
        True if they intersect, false otherwise

      • isInside

        public boolean isInside(AxisAlignedBoundingBox other)
        Returns true if this is inside the other AABB, false otherwise. They may share edges.
        Parameters:
        other - The other AABB to test collision with
        Returns:
        True if this is completely inside the other, false otherwise

        Copy the values from the other AABB to this AABB.
        Parameters:
        other - The AABB to copy values from
